com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx

Class CRXPasswordFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx.CRXPasswordFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bouncycastle.openssl.PasswordFinder

    @Component(role=CRXPasswordFinder.class,
           hint="crx")
public class CRXPasswordFinder
extends Object
implements org.bouncycastle.openssl.PasswordFinder
    A PasswordFinder object that is used by a PEMReader to decrypt a PEM file containing a public/private key pair.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CRXPasswordFinder(String passwordString)
      Construct the PasswordFinder object initialising it with a plain text password string.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char[] getPassword()
      Get the plain text password decrypting it if necessary.
